original_text: And white robes were given unto every one of them; and it was said unto them, that they should rest yet for a little season, until their fellowservants also and their brethren, that should be killed as they were, should be fulfilled.
korean_text: 각각 그들에게 흰 두루마기를 주시며 이르시되 아직 잠시 동안 쉬되 그들의 동무 종들과 형제들도 자기처럼 죽임을 당하여 그 수가 차기까지 하라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: And white robes were given unto every one of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 흰 옷이 그들 각자에게 주어졌고

sentences.original_text: and it was said unto them
that they should rest yet for a little season
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 아직 잠시 동안 쉬어야 한다고

sentences.original_text: until their fellowservants also and their brethren
that should be killed as they were
